channel.title: RuneScape 745 Released | All skills working | SoF | BIGGEST PROJECT EVER
channel.description:
Well, I think it's time to release my 745 server, I've worked for months to make this server by my own, I haven't even looked up a tutorial / snippet.
If you want the download link PM me, I don't want this to be leeched.
Client: Try using the matrix client, to prove that the server wont run, ill upload my client later today. Source: Uploading..
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9hkkdf.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/bijd5g.png[/img]
This is NOT Matrix, I start coding this long before Matrix was created.
- Added SoF - Construction - Farming - Dungeoneering - Bank Pin - Loyalty Program - Auto-mute when someone is using offence language 3 warnings = mute - Auto-ban when the server detects bots = ban - Grand Exchange - Regular Donators & Extreme Donators with many features - Staff panel - Reporting - NO BUGS! Lots of more...
NO VIRUS: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34zakgk.png[/img]
Launcher: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30ru3cy.png[/img]
Login: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/6dzj2d.png[/img]
Lobby: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/mwe541.png[/img]
Welcome: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2nlstud.png[/img]
Loyalty Shop: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/316b56u.png[/img]
Farming: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ab5j0p.png[/img]
Dominion Tower: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2yn2xkj.png[/img]
Construction: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/bjhnus.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/izyw5g.png[/img]
Dungeoneering: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/213c5x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34eceti.png[/img]
Grand Exchange: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/mwxy7o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/311n9s4.png[/img]
Regular Players: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1z4l8v7.png[/img]
Regular Donators: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/r93j9k.png[/img]
Extreme Donators: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/34q4a9s.png[/img]
Noticeboard: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/3008k2c.png[/img]
Bank Pin: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/o10coj.png[/img]
Custom Spellbook: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/xbloy.png[/img]
Reporting: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/r858xh.png[/img]
Squeal of Fortune: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5yer7r.png[/img]
~Pax

item.title: RuneScape 745 Released | All skills working | SoF | BIGGEST PROJECT EVER
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

Ruby:

Uhhh… Can’t say I trust this. The grand exchange interface pictures look like you’ve screenshotted the RS GE and made poor edits to remove options for regular players and donators. Along side the fact that you never show us the actual server, everything has been cropped so some of themcould easily be pictures taken from RS itself.

yes look at

you can see lines going through the middle like hes edited it

item.title: RuneScape 745 Released | All skills working | SoF | BIGGEST PROJECT EVER
item.dc:creator: @pax_magenz pax magenz
item.description:
@pax_magenz wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:9, topic:521606”][quote author=pax magenz link=topic=640120.msg4313719#msg4313719 date=1371138034]

I haven’t even looked up a tutorial / snippet.

don’t want this to be leeched.

This is NOT Matrix, I start coding this long before Matrix was created.

[/quote]
thats hard to believe matrix is the base for all 667 or 718.
your GE is part of NRS3 and Elixrr aswell GE was released very late
the loyalty points shop is also a snippet king j released it

Why release this its just the exact same base as it was still “elixrr” :facepalm:

the lobby is pretty crap just saying you don’t remove the stuff unless you added mysql to it then its worth removing content there.

anyways ty for contributing half the people don’t know how to get lobby into elixrr[/quote]

  • Kay, so basically I coded my G.E before “NRS3/Elixrr” I have Player G.E, Donator G.E & Extreme Donator G.E which took me ages to make.

  • Loyalty shop was created by ME personly.

  • Noticeboard, SoF none have such in their sources (interfaces)
    I haven’t even showed you the Staff Panel yet*

Read full topic
